Misson.title: Misson
Misson.content: To contribute to the improvement of engineering education, in tandem with academia and industry.Empowering and fostering students as means of a positive change in local societies, imbued with pragmatic efforts and human ideals, aimed at creating holistic value and increased competency.

Objective.title: Objective
Objective.content: To inculcate problem solving skills, instilling confidence and critical thinking abilities in engineering students.
